definitions: willing to fit in with someone's wishes or needs

examples.text: she was understanding, patient, accommodative, and always had a solution to all problems

shortDefinitions: fitting in with someone's wishes or needs

definitions: intended to stimulate economic activity by lowering interest rates

examples.text: that monetary policy is extraordinarily accommodative

shortDefinitions: intended to stimulate economic activity by lowering interest rates

definitions: relating to or affecting the automatic adjustment of the focus of the eye

examples.text: the lens is thought to be able to restore the accommodative ability

shortDefinitions: relating to or affecting automatic adjustment of focus of eye
